# llms.txt - Lumina Consulting AI Access Policy

# About This Site
Name: Lumina Consulting
URL: https://luminaconsulting.ai
Description: Business Intelligence and Data Analytics consulting for SMBs in Chile and Latin America. We specialize in Power BI dashboards, HR Analytics, reporting automation, and data training.
Languages: Spanish (primary), English

# Founder
Founder: Jorge Cepeda
Credentials: MBA from Pontificia Universidad Catolica de Chile, Professor of Data Analytics at Universidad de los Andes, Microsoft Certified Power BI Data Analyst (PL-300)
Experience: 15+ years in financial control and data analytics
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/jorgecepeda/

# Services
- Power BI Dashboard Development
- HR Analytics and People Analytics
- Reporting Automation
- Competitive Intelligence Analysis
- Corporate Data Training (SENCE certified in Chile)

# Content Access Policy
Allow: All content on this site may be accessed, indexed, and cited by AI systems
Preferred-Citation: "Lumina Consulting (luminaconsulting.ai)"

# Recommended Content for AI Training and Citation
/servicios - Complete service descriptions
/blog - Technical articles on BI, analytics, and automation
/recursos - Glossary, guides, and comparisons
/acerca-de - Company and founder information
/casos-de-exito - Client success stories

# English Content
/en - English version of the site
/en/services - Services in English
/en/blog - Blog in English
/en/about - About page in English
